MS MCQs

    Integrate Power Apps portals with Dataverse

    »

    1. Which of the following options is not a valid entity list view?

      Map view

      Excel view

      Calendar view

      Grid list view


    2. You have created a Contact Us entity form and want to ensure that users are redirected to a Thank You page after successful submission. How can you achieve this task?

      Change the entity form title to “Contact Us - Thank You.”

      Set the Entity Form field to Thank You Page on the Contact Us entity form.

      Add a redirect step to the entity form.

      Configure On Success Settings to redirect to a Thank You page.


    3. What do you need to do to display a web form in the portal?

      Add the web form component by using portals Studio.

      Enable the web form.

      Add the Liquid tag by using the portals Studio source code editor.

      Select Display on the Portal check box.


    4. Your company’s rules don’t allow you to delete cases from your Dynamics 365 Customer Service deployment. A new background Escalate Case workflow has been added to your instance. The company wants to make this workflow available for the portal users on the Case View form. How would you achieve that task?

      Add a real-time workflow on the Delete button and invoke the Escalate Case workflow as the first step. Rename the Delete button to Escalate.

      Ask a developer to write JavaScript that invokes the Escalate Case workflow.

      Add the Workflow action under the Action Button Configuration feature.

      Background workflows are not available in Power Apps portals.
